name: X-Racing
description:
X-Racing is not just circuit racing, it's an interactive action game with an open world and a storyline, good graphics and cool cars, different game modes and online play!

Physics:
Physics and behavior of the car at a good level!


Damage system:
The game has a good car damage system, which allows you to practically break the car beyond recognition


Vehicles:
We bring to your attention a variety of types of transport, of various classes, from small cars to sports cars.


Customize your car:
In the garage, you have the opportunity to customize the car for yourself, upgrade the engine, handling and brakes, as well as install and configure various systems like (ABS,ESP,TRACTIONS CONTROLS, WHEEL DRIVE And etc)


Environment:
In the game, you will have access to various levels from mountainous locations, deserts, highways to urban development with an open world, traffic and NPCs


Game modes:

Arena (Derby) - defeat the enemy by breaking his car!

Top Speed - Accelerate down the highway as fast as you can squeeze out of your car and arrive at your destination

Checkpoints - reach the point in the shortest way

Story - The storyline in the game
